abstract: Robin Pogrebin Inside Art column; art dealers reject notion that most art at Art Basel Miami Beach has been presold and collectors are there for parties; Universal Limited Art Editions print shop will be in attendance at Art Basel Miami Beach for first time; Argentine hotelier and developer Alan Faena's $150 Faena Forum cultural center has not been completed in time for Miami art fair but is scheduled for September unveiling, complete with performances and installations.
lead_paragraph: Veteran dealers say they get their best results at this art fair.

headline.main: At Art Basel Miami, a Mix of Parties and Business
headline.print_headline: At Art Basel Miami, They Don’t Come Just for the Parties

snippet: Veteran dealers say they get their best results at this art fair.
